title: Child recovering after mother accidentally shoots him
content:
SAN ANTONIO - A child was recovering Friday night after he was accidentally shot by his mother.
The incident happened just before 10 p.m. Thursday at a home on Canterbury Drive.
Police said the mother was cleaning her gun when it went off and shot her 8-year-old son in the leg.
The boy was taken to University Hospital and is expected to be okay.
Authorities said the mother would not be charged.
